column1: Little Goat Diner////Fantastic food and even better service.  The mixologists know what they're doing--so some of the mixed drinks are really stellar.  But more importantly
column2: they know what they're talking about on the different boozes.  The food is outstanding and worth the trip.  The pork in green sauce
column3: the short rib in asian slaw
column4: and the white fish were all highlights.
